meta_title: What is a Bill of Materials (BOM)? Definition & Importance
meta_description: A Bill of Materials (BOM) is a complete list of parts and components needed for asset maintenance. Understand how BOMs optimize inventory and work orders.
title: What is a Bill of Materials (BOM)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is a Bill of Materials (BOM)?

image_prompt: A high-tech, professional industrial setting. A maintenance planner in a clean reflective vest and hardhat is using a tablet to inspect a complex modular conveyor system. In the background, a large digital screen displays a transparent 3D exploded view of the machine parts (an indented BOM visualization). The lighting is bright and modern, emphasizing a data-driven manufacturing environment. No text.
